attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see the hype but as soon as I started looking he sent me a personal message remind you I am underage and he was sending me pictures of his penis😔. I’m only 4. the world we live in is so messed up. Get the peto out of the White House 😤😤.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review:
I was like ok look at this app and I get it and open it and I was like why is there a Cheeto app and why is it deformed no to mention it’s a racist Cheeto. If only I can give it less then one start😔

You have the confidence 💖🧚🏽‍♀️🌸 but you shouldn’t 🦋🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🌸💖
attributes.title: Why is there an app all about a deformed Cheeto???

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to investigate Donald Trump further, but once it realized I was Black and Latino it put me to work as a house slave and told me to build the wall. How am I supposed to build the wall while I’m polishing the silver??? Poor planning if you ask me.
attributes.title: Would not recommend

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it asked for my phone number, after that it asked for my SSN a to confirm my voter registration. After I registered, my bank account was compromised and I keep getting spam texts to my personal number
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I am at a LOSS FOR WORDS😡i had such high hopes for this application, seeing that it was an app made by our truly gracious president, mr. donald j. trump.✨🦅 however, it pains me to say that this app was down right a travesty to this great country🇺🇸i hope that our president seeks help, and restores his conservative reputation😔
attributes.title: my republican heart is broken💔🇺🇸

attributes.review: My grandson timmy recommended this app to me. At first it seemed like everything i wanted in an app, conservative, american and brought me closer to good old Donnie. Unfortunately, it seems like the libtards have taken over and hacked the app!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! my phone is now “glitching” like my grandson would say and i BLAME IT ON TRUMP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 😠😡🤬
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED....!

attributes.review: I downloaded this to keep up with mister “grab them by the p*ssy” himself. After only being on the app for a few minutes I received a text from Trump and his two sons asking to be in an orgy with them. If Junior wasn’t involved... no I wouldn’t do it
attributes.title: Scared

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app wanting to support my fellow president. Five minutes later bad things started to happen. My phone was glitchy and saying "Cause baby you're a firework. Come on show 'em what your worth. Make 'em go "Oh, oh oh!". As you shoot across the sky-y-y-y" 

I was terrified. I didn't want to delete this app bc i wanted to support my cute little president. I had no choice but to Uninstall. 

It didn't work- I had to get a whole new phone. I 

!!!DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO DESTROY YOUR PHONE!!!!
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!😱

attributes.review: I loved watching Donny on TV he was the greatest apprentice of them all, but this app makes me think he needs to go back for more mentoring. The app glitches so much that I can’t tell if Donny cant make simple sentences anymore or if the app is skipping every other word.
attributes.title: Oof
